aptitude will install everything that apt-get will (no more) just that using aptitude will will install suggested packages automaticly where as apt-get wont
aptitude adn apt are the same package manager (sptitude is more advanced)
aptitude and apt-get will install the same sofatware (the package managers read the repos) thats all they do
aptitude will remove things that apt wont if installed with aptitude
its your repos that decide what packages you can have nothing more nothing less
the package managers read the repos when you type the command that is all they do read and grab
